column2: John Hancock Hedged Equity & Income Fund

John Hancock Hedged Equity & Income Fund (the fund) is a closed-end management investment company. The Fund invests in a portfolio of common stocks, corporate bonds, term loans, preferred securities, convertible bonds and short-term investments and other. It invests in various sectors, such as financials, communication services, energy, information technology, consumer discretionary, industrials, healthcare, utilities, consumer staples, real estates, materials and short-term investments and other. The Fundâ€™s investment manager is John Hancock Investment Management LLC.
